downloadDescription: The content you requested has already retired. It's available to download on this page.
detailsSection: Internet Explorer 6 content, including the Internet Explorer 6 Administration Kit Service Pack 1: Deployment Guide and the Microsoft Internet Explorer 6 Resource Kit, which includes technical detail, insider insights, and must-have tools—including the Internet Explorer Administration Kit (IEAK).
systemRequirementsSection: Windows NT, Windows 2000, or Windows XP
installInstructionSection:
1. The download is a pdf file. To start the download, click Download.
  2. If the File Download dialog box appears, do one of the following:
    • To start the download immediately, click Open.
    • To copy the download to your computer to view at a later time, click Save.
